link.title: Playlist Link
link.description: The URL link to the YouTube playlist.

playlistDescription.title: Playlist Description
playlistDescription.description: A detailed description of the YouTube playlist.

publishedAt.title: Publish Date
publishedAt.description: The date and time when the playlist was published.

channelId.title: Channel ID
channelId.description: The ID of the YouTube channel that owns the playlist.

channelTitle.title: Channel Title
channelTitle.description: The title of the YouTube channel that owns the playlist.

thumbnails.description: Various resolution thumbnails for the playlist.

default.title: Default Thumbnail
default.description: URL for the default thumbnail image.

medium.title: Medium Thumbnail
medium.description: URL for the medium-sized thumbnail image.

high.title: High Thumbnail
high.description: URL for the high-resolution thumbnail image.

standard.title: Standard Thumbnail
standard.description: URL for the standard thumbnail image.

localized.title: Localized Information
localized.description: Localized title and description for different regions.

title.title: Localized Title
title.description: The localized title of the playlist.

description.title: Localized Description
description.description: The localized description of the playlist.
